xyz.fsgik.common.net.http

类 FsHttp

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.fsgik.common.net.http.FsHttp

  • public class FsHttp
extends java.lang.Object
    Http utilities, based on FsHttpClient.defaultClient().

      • encodeForm

        public static java.lang.String encodeForm(java.lang.String formString)
        Encodes given form string (for application/x-www-form-urlencoded) with URLEncoder.encode(String, String). Using FsChars.defaultCharset().
        参数:
        formString - given form string
        返回:
        encoded string

      • encodeForm

        public static java.lang.String encodeForm(java.lang.String formString,
                                          java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Encodes given form string (for application/x-www-form-urlencoded) with URLEncoder.encode(String, String).
        参数:
        formString - given form string
        charset - charset
        返回:
        encoded string

      • encodeQuery

        public static java.lang.String encodeQuery(java.lang.String queryString)
        Encodes given query string (for url after '?') with URLEncoder.encode(String, String) and replace '+' to '%20'. Using FsChars.defaultCharset().
        参数:
        queryString - given query string
        返回:
        encoded string

      • encodeQuery

        public static java.lang.String encodeQuery(java.lang.String queryString,
                                           java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Encodes given query string (for url after '?') with URLEncoder.encode(String, String) and replace '+' to '%20'.
        参数:
        queryString - given query string
        charset - charset
        返回:
        encoded string

      • decodeFormOrQuery

        public static java.lang.String decodeFormOrQuery(java.lang.String encoded)
        Decodes given form or query string with URLDecoder.decode(String, String). Using FsChars.defaultCharset().
        参数:
        encoded - given form or query string
        返回:
        decoded string

      • decodeFormOrQuery

        public static java.lang.String decodeFormOrQuery(java.lang.String encoded,
                                                 java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Decodes given form or query string with URLDecoder.decode(String, String).
        参数:
        encoded - given form or query string
        charset - charset
        返回:
        decoded string
